attributes.action: take whatever steps he can, up to and including legislation, to prevent families having a large number of their own biological children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I frequently read of families with 10 or more children and these stories always seem to say that they're not satisfied even with the number that they have and they want still more.  In my Sunday magazine I read of a couple expecting their SEVENTEENTH child and they STILL want more.  Every child born is a new person who will use up his/her share of the world's finite resources; if the Government is really serious about combatting climate change it will bring in laws to limit the number of biological children any one couple can have; if they want more they should adopt.  If laws can be brought in banning abortion after a certain period in the pregnancy - which could be seen as interferance in people's private affairs - why not this too?
